## AdapterInterface.insert() method

Insert a document into the database

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
insert(payload: Datamodel, options?: any): Promise<Datamodel>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  payload | Datamodel | Payload |
|  options | any | <i>(Optional)</i> Object containing options. Options may be database specific |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;Datamodel&gt;
